name: Georges St-Pierre
plot: Georges St-Pierre is a Canadian former professional mixed martial artist. He is widely regarded as one of the greatest fighters in mixed martial arts history. St-Pierre was a two-division champion in the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC), having won titles in the welterweight and middleweight divisions. St-Pierre is a three-time former UFC Welterweight Champion, having won the title twice and the interim title once between November 2006 and April 2008. St-Pierre was ranked as the #1 welterweight in the world for several years by Sherdog and numerous other publications. In 2008, 2009, and 2010 he was named the Canadian Athlete of the Year by Rogers Sportsnet.

name: Anderson Silva
plot: Anderson da Silva is a Brazilian-American mixed martial artist. He is a former UFC Middleweight Champion and holds the record for the longest title reign in UFC history at 2,457 days. This started in 2006 and ended in 2013 and included a UFC record 16 consecutive victories in that span. UFC president Dana White and other publications have called Silva the greatest mixed martial artist of all time. Silva is ranked as the #15 Middleweight in the world by Sherdog. He is also the #4 Middleweight in the world by Fight Matrix. Silva is also ranked the #4 Middleweight in the world by MMA Weekly.

name: Jon Jones
plot: Jonathan Dwight Jones is an American professional mixed martial artist and former UFC Light Heavyweight Champion. He is widely regarded as one of the greatest mixed martial artists of all time. As of October 26, 2020, he is #2 in

name: Khabib Nurmagomedov
plot: Khabib Abdulmanapovich Nurmagomedov is a retired Russian professional mixed martial artist. He is widely regarded as one of the greatest fighters in mixed martial arts (MMA) history. He is a two-time Combat Sambo World Champion and holds a black belt in Judo. A two-time Combat Sambo World Champion, Nurmagomedov is also a Judo black belt and a two-time World Sambo Champion. He currently holds the longest undefeated streak in MMA, with 29 wins, and is a former UFC Lightweight Champion. He is the first Muslim to win a UFC title.

name: Conor McGregor
plot: Conor Anthony McGregor is an Irish professional mixed martial artist and boxer. He is a former Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC) featherweight and lightweight double-champion. As of 23 November 2020, he is #13 in the

name: Daniel Cormier
plot: Daniel Ryan Cormier is an American retired professional mixed martial artist and amateur wrestler. He is a former UFC Light Heavyweight and Heavyweight Champion. Cormier is the second fighter in UFC history to hold titles in two weight classes simultaneously and is the first to defend titles in two different divisions. He is also the King of the Cage Heavyweight Champion. Cormier is ranked as the #9 pound-for-pound fighter of all-time by Sherdog. He is also ranked the #2 Light Heavyweight in the world by Sherdog. Cormier is also ranked the #2 Light Heavyweight in the world by Fight Matrix.

name: Demetrious Johnson
plot: Demetrious Khrisna Johnson is an American retired mixed martial artist. He is widely regarded as one of the greatest mixed martial artists of all time. He is a former UFC Flyweight Champion and currently competes in ONE Championship. He is the inaugural and former Flyweight Champion of the UFC and currently competes in ONE Championship. Johnson is the #1 Flyweight in the world by Sherdog. He is also ranked the #1 Flyweight in the world by Fight Matrix. Johnson is also ranked the #1 Flyweight in the world by MMA Weekly.

name: Amanda Nunes
plot: Amanda Lourenço Nunes is a Brazilian professional mixed martial artist. She currently competes in the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC), in which she is the reigning champion

name: Alex Volkanovski
plot: Alexander Volkanovski is an Australian mixed martial artist. He is a former Australian Fighting Championship (AFC) Featherweight Champion and currently competes in the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC), where he is the reigning UFC Featherweight Champion. As of 23 November 2020, he

name: Rampage Jackson
plot: Quinton Ramone Jackson is an American retired mixed martial artist, professional wrestler and actor. He is a former UFC Light Heavyweight Champion. Jackson rose to prominence in Japan's Pride Fighting Championships where he was noted for his powerful body sl

name: Shogun Rua
plot: Maurício Milani Rua is a Brazilian mixed martial artist and former UFC Light Heavyweight Champion. A professional competitor since 2002, Rua is a former UFC Light Heavyweight Champion and the 2005 Pride Middleweight Grand Prix Champion. As of 23 November 2020, he is #14 in the UFC Light Heavyweight rankings.

name: Jose Aldo
plot: José Aldo da Silva Oliveira Júnior is a Brazilian professional mixed martial artist. He currently competes in the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC). He was the fourth and final WEC Featherweight Champion, becoming the first UFC Featherweight Champion after the UFC/WEC merger. He is a former three-time UFC Featherweight Champion overall, having been the champion twice before losing the title in 2015 and once more in 2019. As of 23 November 2020, he is #6 in the UFC Bantamweight rankings.

name: Max Holloway
plot: Jerome Max Keli'i Holloway is an American professional mixed martial artist. He currently competes in the Featherweight division for the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC), where he is a former UFC Featherweight Champion. As of 23 November 2020, he is #1 in the UFC Featherweight rankings.

name: Frakie Edgar
plot: Frank James Edgar is an American professional mixed martial artist. He currently competes in the Bantamweight division of the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC). As of 23 November 2020, he is #8 in the UFC Bantamweight rankings.

name: TJ Dillashaw
plot: Tyler Jeffrey Dillashaw is an American professional mixed martial artist. He is currently signed with the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC) and is a former two-time UFC Bantamweight Champion. As of 23 November 2020, he is #2 in the UFC Bantamweight rankings.

name: Cody Garbrandt
plot: Cody Ray Allen Garbrandt is an American professional mixed martial artist. He is currently signed to the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC) and is a former UFC Bantamweight Champion. As of 23 November 2020, he is #4 in the UFC Bantamweight rankings.

name: Henry Cejudo
plot: Henry Carlos Cejudo is an American retired mixed martial artist and former freestyle wrestler. He is widely regarded as one of the greatest combat sports athletes of all time. As of 23 November 2020, he is #1 in the UFC Bantamweight rankings.

name: Valentina Shevchenko
plot: Valentína Anatolievna Shevchenko is a Kyrgyzstani-Peruvian professional mixed martial artist and former Muay Thai fighter. She currently competes in

name: Brock Lesnar
plot: Brock Edward Lesnar is an American professional wrestler and former mixed martial artist and professional football player. He is currently signed to WWE, where he performs on the Raw brand. He is a former UFC Heavyweight Champion and a former WWE Universal Champion. As of 23 November 2020, he is #7 in the UFC Heavyweight rankings.

name: Stipe Miocic
plot: Stipe Miocic is an American professional mixed martial artist and firefighter-paramedic of Croatian descent. He is currently signed to the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC), in which he competes in the heavyweight division and is a former UFC Heavyweight Champion. As of 23 November 2020, he is #1 in the UFC Heavyweight rankings.

name: Francis Ngannou
plot: Francis Zavier Ngannou is a Cameroonian-French professional mixed martial artist. He currently competes in the Heavyweight division for the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC), in which he is the reigning UFC Heavyweight Champion. As of 23 November 2020, he is #2 in the UFC Heavyweight rankings.

name: Wanderlei Silva
plot: Wanderlei César da Silva is a Brazilian-American mixed martial artist who has competed in Japan's Pride Fighting

name: Chuck Liddell
plot: Charles David Liddell is an American retired mixed martial artist and former UFC Light Heavyweight Champion. He has an extensive striking background in Kempo, Koei-Kan karate and kickboxing, as well as a grappling background in collegiate wrestling and Brazilian jiu-jitsu. Liddell had 23 fights in the UFC; along with Randy Couture, he is widely credited for bringing MMA into the mainstream of American sports and entertainment. On July 10, 2009, he was inducted into the UFC Hall of Fame.

name: Randy Couture
plot: Randy Duane Couture is an American actor, retired mixed martial artist, and former U.S. Army Sergeant. Couture is a three-time former UFC Heavyweight Champion, two-time UFC Light Heavyweight Champion, an interim UFC Light Heavyweight Champion, and the UFC 13 Heavyweight Tournament Winner. Couture has competed in a record 16 title fights. He is the first of only two fighters to hold two UFC championship titles in two different divisions (along with BJ Penn).

name: Tito Ortiz
plot: Jacob Christopher Ortiz is an American mixed martial artist and politician. He is currently signed to the Combate Americas promotion. Ortiz is considered one of the sport's all-time greats, holding the UFC Light Heavyweight Championship from April 14, 2000, to September 26, 2003. Along with fighters like Randy Couture and Chuck Liddell, he was one of the sport's early stars. Ortiz ultimately became the biggest pay-per-view draw of 2006 for his fights with Liddell, Forrest Griffin, and Ken Shamrock.

name: Dan Henderson
plot: Daniel Jeffery Henderson is an American retired mixed martial artist and former Olympic wrestler, who last competed as a middleweight in the Ultimate Fighting Championship. He was the last Strikeforce Light Heavyweight Champion and was the last Welterweight (183 lb) and Middleweight (205 lb) champion of Pride Fighting Championships. He was the first mixed martial artist to hold two titles in two different weight classes in a major MMA promotion. At the time of his retirement after UFC 204, he was the oldest fighter on the UFC roster.

name: Mirko Cro Cop
plot: Mirko Filipović is a Croatian retired professional mixed martial artist, kickboxer, amateur boxer, and politician. He is a former member of the Croatian Parliament. Filipović is the 2006 Pride Open-Weight Grand Prix Champion, the 2012 K-1 World Grand Prix Champion, and the 2016 Rizin Openweight Grand Prix Champion. He is widely considered to be one of the greatest heavyweight kickboxers of all time.

name: Urijah Faber
plot: Urijah Christopher Faber is an American retired mixed martial artist and actor who fought as a bantamweight and featherweight in the Ultimate Fighting Championship. Faber won the WEC Featherweight Championship at WEC 19 on March 17, 2006, and held the title for over two years until his first title defense on June 1, 2008. He has been a top contender in the bantamweight division for many years.

name: Lyoto Machida
plot: Lyoto Carvalho Machida is a Brazilian professional mixed martial artist, currently signed with Bellator MMA. He is a former UFC Light Heavyweight Champion. He is often regarded as one of the best light heavyweights of all time and is considered to be one of the best karate practitioners in MMA history. He is the former UFC Light Heavyweight Champion, as well as the former King of the Cage Light Heavyweight Champion. As of 23 November 2020, he is #7 in the Bellator Light Heavyweight rankings.

name: Michael Bisping
plot: Michael Bisping is an English sports analyst, actor, commentator, and retired mixed martial artist, who competed in the Middleweight division of the UFC. A professional competitor from 2004 to 2017, he is a former UFC Middleweight Champion. He won the title on June 4, 2016, by knocking out Luke Rockhold in the first round, and became the first British fighter to win a UFC title. He defended his title against Dan Henderson in Manchester in October 2016 before losing it to Georges St-Pierre on November 4, 2017. As of 23 November 2020, he is #15 in the UFC Middleweight rankings.
